â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

he might be Mafia even more questionable. It seems you're trying to cast suspicion on a 
confirmed Town role who is now dead. I think we need to carefully examine why Grace is now 
trying to retroactively frame a dead Town member as potentially Mafia. This looks like an 
attempt to deflect attention or sow confusion. I am more suspicious of Grace right now."

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

his role as Doctor is also very concerning. It's true that a genuine Doctor would rarely expose 
themselves so early, as it makes them an immediate target. However, the fact that Henry *was* 
indeed the Doctor and was killed last night, makes your suggestion that he might be Mafia even 
more perplexing, Eve correctly pointed this out. It almost feels like an attempt to 
retroactively discredit a confirmed Town member. I think we need to look very closely at who 
benefits from trying to sow confusion around a dead Town role right now. Grace, your quickness 
to accuse yesterday, coupled with this attempt to question a dead Doctor's allegiance today, is

the waters now."

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

mischaracterizing my statement about Henry. I never said Henry was definitely Mafia - I said his
role reveal was either a lie OR a catastrophic mistake. Since he's now confirmed dead as Doctor,

dangerous, which unfortunately proved correct. The fact that you're both twisting my words to 
make it sound like I'm 'retroactively framing a dead Town member' is concerning deflection. 
Nick, your attempt to paint my Bob analysis as 'rapid suspicion despite limited evidence' 
ignores that 6 out of 7 players agreed with my assessment. Bob WAS trying to discourage town 
discussion - that's not rapid, that's pattern recognition. With only 5 of us left and 2 Mafia 
still alive, we're one mislynch away from losing. The coordinated attack on me from multiple 
players feels like Mafia trying to eliminate someone who's been effective at spotting suspicious
behavior. I'm most suspicious of Eve and Nick right now - Eve for the mischaracterization of my 
Henry comment, and Nick for trying to rewrite yesterday's events."

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚

Nick: "I think Grace is suspicious because throughout the discussions, her actions and 
statements have been consistent in targeting players who are now confirmed as Town members or 
are creating confusion around their roles. While her initial analysis of Bob seemed valid at the
time, her comments about Henry after his death were perplexing and raised questions about her 
motives. The fact that she quickly pointed fingers at both Bob and Henry, and now is on the 
defensive, suggests a pattern of behavior that aligns with trying to mislead Town and deflect 
attention from herself. This, coupled with the coordinated effort to distance herself from her 
previous statements, suggests a level of manipulation consistent with Mafia strategy. Therefore,

â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

accusations. If you execute me, you're eliminating an active Villager who correctly identified 
manipulative behavior patterns, and with only 5 of us left and 2 Mafia still alive, we literally
cannot afford another mislynch. The real Mafia are among those trying to twist my pro-town 
analysis into something sinister. I urge you to vote innocent and focus on the actual threats 
among us."

Defense complete. Moving to judgment...

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚

Eve: GUILTY - Grace's behavior has become increasingly suspicious. While her initial assessment 
of Bob was accurate and aligns with what many of us observed, her subsequent attempt to 
discredit Henry, a confirmed dead Doctor, by suggesting he might have been Mafia or made a 
'catastrophic mistake' after he was killed by the Mafia, is highly problematic. This is not 
simply 'mischaracterizing her words' as she claims; it's an attempt to sow confusion around a 
confirmed Town role who was eliminated by the Mafia. This kind of retroactive muddying of the 
waters around a dead Town member directly benefits the Mafia by creating doubt and diverting 
attention from the real threats. Her aggressive defense and counter-accusation against Nick and 
myself when her statements are questioned further reinforce my suspicion that she is attempting 
to manipulate the discussion and deflect from her own actions. The pattern of swift accusation, 
followed by confusing deflection and counter-accusation, points towards a Mafia member trying to
survive.

â”‚                               Game Rules (Town of Salem Style)                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚ Mafia is a social deduction game between two teams:                                          â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town (Villagers, Detective, Doctor): Win by eliminating all Mafia                         â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Win when they equal or outnumber Town                                              â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                            Roles                                             â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Villager: No special ability. Use logic and discussion to find Mafia.                     â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Detective: Each night, investigate one player to learn if they are Mafia.                 â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Doctor: Each night, choose one player to protect from being killed.                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Know each other. Each night, choose one Town player to kill.                       â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                     Game Flow (Each Day)                                     â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  1 Night: Mafia kills, Doctor protects, Detective investigates                               â”‚
â”‚  2 Discussion: Everyone speaks (2 rounds) - share suspicions and theories                    â”‚
â”‚  3 Nomination: Everyone nominates one suspect - most nominated goes to trial                 â”‚
â”‚  4 Defense: Accused player defends themselves, others respond                                â”‚
â”‚  5 Judgment: Vote GUILTY or INNOCENT - majority decides fate                                 â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚                                           Strategy                                           â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Town: Find inconsistencies, share info carefully, vote out suspects                       â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Mafia: Blend in, deflect suspicion, eliminate threats at night                            â”‚
â”‚  â€¢ Don't reveal power roles too early - Mafia will target you!                               â”‚
â”‚                                                                                              â”‚
